result.arabic_text: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن يَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡأٓنَ يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابٗا رَّصَدٗا
result.translation: “Kandi mu by’ukuri twajyaga tuhagira ibyicaro kugira ngo twumvirize (ibivugirwa mu Ijuru), ariko ubu uwagerageza kumviriza yahura n’igishirira kimwubikiriye.”
